item.title: Google Devfest 2019 - Think Beyond Keyboard and Screen
item.description: Presented At : Google DevFest 2019, by Google Developer’s Group, GDG Cloud Delhi . The talks is about How the User interactions evolved with time? Why is it important to think beyond the tradition keyboard and screen? Where is the industry heading? How will it impact us? Intro here Explore the world beyond your normal ways of communicating with smart devices! #Explore AR/VR with @thinkuldeep@WTM_Delhi @gdg_nd @thoughtworksIN
